section.37: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah:"Some people raided the milk camels of the Messenger of Allah [SAW]. They were brought to the Prophet [SAW], and the Prophet [SAW] had their hands and feet cut off and their eyes gouged out." This is the wording of Ibn Al-Muthanna
